koohiiStory2: The Inuit used water-proof seal pelts for their kayaks, to travel the waves.
myStory: sóng. da nước. bề mặt nước
words:
短波(たんぱ): short wave
津波(つなみ): tsunami, tidal wave
電波(でんぱ): electro-magnetic wave
